powerpagecomponent.content: {"description":"A collection of search logical name filter options. Defining a value here will add dropdown filter options to site-wide search.\n\nThis value should be in the form of name/value pairs, with name and value separated by a colon, and pairs separated by a semicolon. For example: \"Forums:adx_communityforum,adx_communityforumthread,adx_communityforumpost;Blogs:adx_blog,adx_blogpost,adx_blogpostcomment\"."}
powerpagecomponent.name: search/filters
